entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
